study.name: Human retinal cells and retinopathy
study.description: Investigating Human (homo sapiens) retinal cells in advanced retinopathy patients (XB). Human (homo sapiens) retina cells have been shown to undergo changes as disease progress. Jean Chang, Eric Weitz, Jon Bistline, Eno-Abasi Augustine-Akpan, Devon Bush, Vicky Horst. Journal of SCP Synthetic Studies. Volume 1, p1, February 2020. Adding synthetic study data to development and staging environments has been shown to improve testability of new code. We extend those findings to the Single Cell Portal by adding this synthetic data.
